src:
Ada Unjuk Rasa soal Revolusi PSSI di Wisma 46 BNI, Lalin Tersendat
02 Nov 2019, 13:22 by Sachril Agustin Berutu
Jakarta - Massa menggelar unjuk rasa terkait revolusi PSSI di sekitar Wisma 46 BNI, Jakarta Pusat. Demo ini membuat lalu lintas di jalan itu terhambat.
Pantauan detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019), sekitar pukul 12.50 WIB, massa tiba di depan gedung Wisma 46 BNI. Akibat dari demo ini, lalu lintas di Jalan RM Margono Djojohadikoesoemo, Jakarta Pusat, sedikit terhambat. Beberapa kendaraan terlihat melintas pelan-pelan.


Lalu lintas sedikit tersendat. (Sachril Agustin Berutu/detikcom)

Terlihat, polisi sudah berada di lokasi untuk melakukan pengamanan. Massa melakukan aksi dengan membawa dua bendera besar dan empat spanduk yang bertulisan 'Revolusi PSSI'.
Setelah melakukan unjuk rasa, massa membubarkan diri pada pukul 12.57 WIB. Mereka melakukan long march ke arah Manggarai dengan berjalan kaki.
Terpantau, polisi melakukan pengamanan dengan mengikuti massa. Kendaraan pun terlihat mengantre di belakang massa.
Namun kemacetan yang terjadi tidaklah panjang. Massa pun membubarkan diri ke arah Jalan Sudirman. Setelah massa meninggalkan lokasi pada pukul 13.02 WIB, lalu lintas di Jalan RM Margono Djojohadikoesoemo atau di sekitar Shangri-La ramai-lancar.

(aan/aan)
text:
There was a rally about the PSSI Revolution at Wisma 46 BNI, Lalin Tersendat
02 Nov 2019, 13:22 by Sachril Agustin Berutu
Jakarta - The mass held a demonstration related to the PSSI revolution around Wisma 46 BNI, Central Jakarta. This demo hampered the traffic on the road.
AFP monitoring on Saturday (11/02/2019), around 12.50 WIB, the masses arrived in front of the Wisma 46 BNI building. As a result of this demonstration, traffic on Jalan RM Margono Djojohadikoesoemo, Central Jakarta, was slightly hampered. Several vehicles were seen passing slowly.


The traffic is a little choked up. (Sachril Agustin Berutu / detikcom)

Visible, the police are already at the location to do security. The crowd carried out the action by carrying two large flags and four banners that read 'PSSI Revolution'.
After the demonstration, the crowd dispersed at 12.57 WIB. They did a long march toward Manggarai on foot.
Monitored, the police conduct security by following the masses. Vehicles were seen lining up behind the masses.
But the congestion that occurs is not long. The mass dispersed in the direction of Jalan Sudirman. After the masses left the location at 13.02 WIB, traffic on Jalan RM Margono Djojohadikoesoemo or around Shangri-La was busy.

(aan / aan)
